trans-unit.source: Represents a cubic Bezier curve drawn between two points.
trans-unit.target: 表示两个点之间绘制一条三次方贝塞尔曲线。

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> object to store BezierSegment objects and other segments.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>要存储 BezierSegment 对象和其他段对象。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>

trans-unit.source: A cubic Bezier curve is defined by four points: a start point, an end point (<xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point3%2A>), and two control points (<xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point1%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point2%2A>).The BezierSegment class does not contain a property for the starting point of the curve; it only defines the end point.
trans-unit.target: 由四个点定义三次方贝塞尔曲线︰ 起点、 终点 (<xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point3%2A>) 和两个控制点 (<xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point1%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point2%2A>)。BezierSegment 类不包含曲线; 的起始点的属性它只定义了终结点。</xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point2%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point1%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point3%2A>

trans-unit.source: The beginning point of the curve is the current point of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> to which the BezierSegment is added.
trans-unit.target: 曲线起始点是的当前点<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>向其添加 BezierSegment。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>

trans-unit.source: The two control points of a cubic Bezier curve behave like magnets, attracting portions of what would otherwise be a straight line toward themselves and producing a curve.
trans-unit.target: 三次方贝塞尔曲线的两个控制点的行为类似于磁铁，吸引本部分的不然就是一条直线朝着自身的方向并生成一条曲线。

trans-unit.source: The first control point, <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point1%2A>, affects the beginning portion of the curve; the second control point, <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point2%2A>, affects the ending portion of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 第一个控制点， <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point1%2A>，影响开头曲线部分; 第二个控制点， <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point2%2A>，影响曲线的结束部分。</xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point2%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point1%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the curve doesn't necessarily pass through either of the control points; each control point moves its portion of the line toward itself, but not through itself.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，曲线不一定通过两个控制点;每个控点将移动行向本身，但无法通过本身其部分。

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features A BezierSegment is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object.
trans-unit.target: 可冻结功能 BezierSegment 是一种<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 璝惠<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>功能，如冻结和克隆，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: A cubic Bezier curve is defined by four points: a start point, an end point (`point3`), and two control points (`point1` and `point2`).
trans-unit.target: 由四个点定义三次方贝塞尔曲线︰ 起始点，一个终结点 (`point3`)，以及两个控制点 (`point1`和`point2`)。

trans-unit.source: This method does not enable you to specify the beginning point of the curve; the curve begins at the current point of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> object to which the <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment> is added.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不会启用你指定的曲线; 的开始点曲线开始的当前点<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>对象<xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment>添加。</xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>

trans-unit.source: The two control points of a cubic Bezier curve behave like magnets, attracting portions of what would otherwise be a straight line toward themselves and producing a curve.
trans-unit.target: 三次方贝塞尔曲线的两个控制点的行为类似于磁铁，吸引本部分的不然就是一条直线朝着自身的方向并生成一条曲线。

trans-unit.source: The first control point, `point1`, affects the beginning portion of the curve; the second control point, `point2`, affects the ending portion of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 第一个控制点， `point1`，影响开头曲线部分; 第二个控制点， `point2`，影响曲线的结束部分。

trans-unit.source: Note that the curve doesn't necessarily pass through either of the control points; each control point moves its portion of the line toward itself, but not through itself.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，曲线不一定通过两个控制点;每个控点将移动行向本身，但无法通过本身其部分。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment"></xref> class with the specified control points, end point, and stroke option.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment"></xref>使用指定的控制点、 终点和描边选项的类。

trans-unit.source: A cubic Bezier curve is defined by four points: a start point, an end point (`point3`), and two control points (`point1` and `point2`).
trans-unit.target: 由四个点定义三次方贝塞尔曲线︰ 起始点，一个终结点 (`point3`)，以及两个控制点 (`point1`和`point2`)。

trans-unit.source: This method does not enable you to specify the beginning point of the curve; the curve begins at the current point of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> object to which the <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment> is added.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不会启用你指定的曲线; 的开始点曲线开始的当前点<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>对象<xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment>添加。</xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>

trans-unit.source: The two control points of a cubic Bezier curve behave like magnets, attracting portions of what would otherwise be a straight line toward themselves and producing a curve.
trans-unit.target: 三次方贝塞尔曲线的两个控制点的行为类似于磁铁，吸引本部分的不然就是一条直线朝着自身的方向并生成一条曲线。

trans-unit.source: The first control point, `point1`, affects the beginning portion of the curve; the second control point, `point2`, affects the ending portion of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 第一个控制点， `point1`，影响开头曲线部分; 第二个控制点， `point2`，影响曲线的结束部分。

trans-unit.source: Note that the curve doesn't necessarily pass through either of the control points; each control point moves its portion of the line toward itself, but not through itself.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，曲线不一定通过两个控制点;每个控点将移动行向本身，但无法通过本身其部分。

trans-unit.source: The first control point, which determines the beginning portion of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 它确定曲线开始部分的第一个控制点。

trans-unit.source: The second control point, which determines the ending portion of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 确定曲线结束部分的第二个控制点。

trans-unit.source: The point to which the curve is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 点到其中绘制曲线。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to stroke the curve when a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref> is used to render the segment; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要对曲线描边时<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"> </xref> ; 否则为将使用呈现线段<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment"></xref>对象，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、 数据绑定和动画，而其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the first control point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置曲线的第一个控制点。

trans-unit.source: The two control points of a cubic Bezier curve behave like magnets, attracting portions of what would otherwise be a straight line toward themselves and producing a curve.
trans-unit.target: 三次方贝塞尔曲线的两个控制点的行为类似于磁铁，吸引本部分的不然就是一条直线朝着自身的方向并生成一条曲线。

trans-unit.source: The first control point, Point1, affects the beginning portion of the curve; the second control point, <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point2%2A>, affects the ending portion of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 第一个控制点 Point1，影响曲线; 的开头部分第二个控制点， <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point2%2A>，影响曲线的结束部分。</xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point2%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the curve doesn't necessarily pass through either of the control points; each control point moves its portion of the line toward itself, but not through itself.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，曲线不一定通过两个控制点;每个控点将移动行向本身，但无法通过本身其部分。

trans-unit.source: The two control points of a cubic Bezier curve behave like magnets, attracting portions of what would otherwise be a straight line toward themselves and producing a curve.
trans-unit.target: 三次方贝塞尔曲线的两个控制点的行为类似于磁铁，吸引本部分的不然就是一条直线朝着自身的方向并生成一条曲线。

trans-unit.source: The first control point, <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point1%2A>, affects the beginning portion of the curve; the second control point, Point2, affects the ending portion of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 第一个控制点， <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point1%2A>，影响曲线; 的开头部分的第二个控制点，Point2，影响曲线结束部分。</xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point1%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the curve doesn't necessarily pass through either of the control points; each control point moves its portion of the line toward itself, but not through itself.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，曲线不一定通过两个控制点;每个控点将移动行向本身，但无法通过本身其部分。

trans-unit.source: The second control point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 曲线的第二个控制点。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point2*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point2*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment.Point2*>

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the end point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置曲线的终点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment> class does not contain a property for the starting point of the curve; it only defines the end point.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment>类并不包含曲线的起始点的属性; 它只定义终结点。</xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment>

trans-unit.source: The beginning point of the curve is the current point of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> to which the <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment> is added.
